formalpara.title: Figure 3. YP170::GFP endocytosis by oocytes
formalpara.para: YP170::GFP is synthesized in the intestine and secreted into the body cavity from which it is endocytosed by oocytes. RME-2 is the yolk receptor expressed in oocytes. Fluorescent micrographs of wild-type and typical rme mutant worms expressing YP170::GFP are shown.
